CLIN 34 â€” Leiden 2024

The 34th Meeting of Computational Linguistics in The Netherlands (CLIN 34), organized by the Leiden University Centre for Linguistics (LUCL), in collaboration with the Leiden Institute of Advanced Computer Science (LIACS), and the Leiden University Centre for Digital Humanities (LUCDH), is set to be held on August 30, 2024 in the Lipsius building of Leiden University, Leiden, The Netherlands.

Participants are encouraged to register online for CLIN 34 by August 21, 2024, or to opt for on-site registration.
Practical information regarding participation and organisation of CLIN 34 can be found here.

News

Online registration closed

22 Aug 2024

Online registration for CLIN 34 is now closed. Participants can still register on site in the Lipsius building on August 30, 2024.

Registration deadline extended

14 Aug 2024

The deadline for registration to CLIN34 has been extended until 21 August 2024. Click here to register.

Registrations to CLIN34 are open

05 Jul 2024

Registrations to CLIN34 are open. Click here to register. Please note that registration closes on 15 August 2024.

15 Jun 2024

Notifications of acceptance for CLIN 34 have been sent out. Find the program here.

Abstract submissions now closed

23 May 2024

Abstract submission for CLIN 34 is now closed! We are pleased to announce we received more than 130 submissions.

GPT-NL: Announcing Dominique Blok and Erik de Graaf from TNO as keynote speakers

14 May 2024

Dominique Blok and Erik de Graaf from TNO will host a keynote regarding GPT-NL at CLIN 34!

Announcing Diana Maynard as a keynote speaker

20 Mar 2024

We are happy to announce Diana Maynard as a keynote speaker for CLIN 34!
